title: Singapore Grand Prix: F1 race will go ahead despite haze blanket
content: CNNSingapore Grand Prix: F1 race will go ahead despite haze blanketCNNIn a statement, Singapore GP said current air quality levels -- rated unhealthy rather than dangerous on the Pollutant Standards Index (PSI) -- meant there were "no plans to amend the published racing and entertainment program." But with the floodlit ...No plans to amend Singapore F1 Grand Prix programme: OrganisersChannel News AsiaSingapore: Fires Diminish Air QualityNew York TimesSingapore GP organisers have a 'contingency plan' if haze worsensSkySportsThe Independent -The Straits Times -Formula 1all 824 news articles »
